name: Pokémon Evil Drill 1 Star Stone
overview: Story: Long ago, there were sacred Orbs. These Orbs were the crystallization of spirit and energy all over the world. You are a trainer who just moved to a whole new region to take on a Pokémon request. Language: Chinese Features: • New tiles and sprites for the game. • All the Legendary Pokémon of Diamond/Pearl. • Fakemon • Mega Evolution will make your Pokemon stronger. • New Gym Leaders and Elite Four.
